Title: Relates to requiring weather radios in all new motor vehicles sold within the state with a model year of 2022 or later
Summary: Requires weather radios in all new motor vehicles sold within the state with a model year of 2022 or later; no car dealership shall increase the cost of a vehicle due to the system including such radio.
LawCode: Add ยง384, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring weather radios in motor vehicles sold within the state with a model year of 2022 or later
